name: The Favour
description:
This is a short project made for the 2022 game jam over on animeotk!

The theme was "role-reversal"

I wanted to try something new, so I had a go at adding some voice-over! 

Since it was made in 2 weeks, it's very short but it's got a few spanking scenes and a gallery. 

I hope you'll enjoy it! Check the 'rewards' section if you want to support more games being made ^^
